SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.rmi

Interface RmiGameController

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiGameServerController
public interface RmiGameController extends Remote
RMI remotable service which will be used to implement GameController This re-declares the same methods, but with an RMI compatible signature, throwing RemoteException instead o DisconnectedException.

The RmiGameController.Adapter is then used in order to be able to have an actual GameController interface implementation

See Also:

  • RmiGameController.Adapter
